languages.text: "Спасибо, Паскаль. Жаль, что в моей голове нет шестеренок, чтобы ты при необходимости мог туда залезть и починить, как чинишь Глейто".

traits.locale_text: "Спасибо, Паскаль. Жаль, что в моей голове нет шестеренок, чтобы ты при необходимости мог туда залезть и починить, как чинишь Глейто".

languages.text: "Thank you, Pasqal. I wish my head were full of cogs so you could always open it and make repairs the same way you do for Glaito."
languages.original_text: "Спасибо, Паскаль. Жаль, что в моей голове нет шестеренок, чтобы ты при необходимости мог туда залезть и починить, как чинишь Глейто".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, Pasqal. I wish my head were full of cogs so you could always open it and make repairs the same way you do for Glaito."
"Thank you, Pasqal. I wish my head were full of cogs so you could always open it and make repairs the same way you do for Glaito."
"Thank you, Pasqal. I wish my head were full of cogs so you could always open it and make repairs the same way you do for Glaito."
"Thank you, Pasqal. I wish my head were full of cogs so you could always open it and make repairs the same way you do for Glaito."
"Thank you, Pasqal. I wish my head were full of cogs so you could always open it and make repairs the same way you do for Glaito."
"Thank you, Pasqal. I wish my head were full of cogs so you could always open it and make repairs the same way you do for Glaito."

languages.text: 「ありがとう、パスカル。俺の頭の中が歯車で出来ていればよかった。そうすればお前がグライトにするみたいに、いつでも開けて直してもらえた」
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Pasqal. I wish my head were full of cogs so you could always open it and make repairs the same way you do for Glaito."

traits.locale_text: 「ありがとう、パスカル。俺の頭の中が歯車で出来ていればよかった。そうすればお前がグライトにするみたいに、いつでも開けて直してもらえた」

languages.text: "Danke, Pasqal. Ich wünschte, mein Kopf wäre voller Zahnräder, damit Ihr ihn immer öffnen und Reparaturen vornehmen könnt, wie Ihr es bei Glaito tut."
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Pasqal. I wish my head were full of cogs so you could always open it and make repairs the same way you do for Glaito."

traits.locale_text: "Danke, Pasqal. Ich wünschte, mein Kopf wäre voller Zahnräder, damit Ihr ihn immer öffnen und Reparaturen vornehmen könnt, wie Ihr es bei Glaito tut."

languages.text: « Merci, Pasqal. J'aimerais que ma tête soit remplie de rouages, pour que vous puissiez l'ouvrir en cas de problème et la réparer comme vous le faites pour Glaito. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Pasqal. I wish my head were full of cogs so you could always open it and make repairs the same way you do for Glaito."

traits.locale_text: « Merci, Pasqal. J'aimerais que ma tête soit remplie de rouages, pour que vous puissiez l'ouvrir en cas de problème et la réparer comme vous le faites pour Glaito. »

languages.text: «Gracias, Pasqal. Ojalá tuviera la cabeza llena de mecanismos para que siempre pudiera abrirla y efectuar reparaciones en ella con tan buena mano como con Glaito».
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Pasqal. I wish my head were full of cogs so you could always open it and make repairs the same way you do for Glaito."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias, Pasqal. Ojalá tuviera la cabeza llena de mecanismos para que siempre pudiera abrirla y efectuar reparaciones en ella con tan buena mano como con Glaito».

languages.text: “谢谢你，帕斯卡。我真希望我的脑子里装满齿轮，这样你就可以随时打开它进行修理，就像你修理格雷托那样。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Pasqal. I wish my head were full of cogs so you could always open it and make repairs the same way you do for Glaito."

traits.locale_text: “谢谢你，帕斯卡。我真希望我的脑子里装满齿轮，这样你就可以随时打开它进行修理，就像你修理格雷托那样。”

languages.text: "Sağ ol Pasqal. Keşke benim kafam da dişlilerle dolu olsaydı da tıpkı Glaito gibi beni de açıp tamir edebilseydin."
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Pasqal. I wish my head were full of cogs so you could always open it and make repairs the same way you do for Glaito."

traits.locale_text: "Sağ ol Pasqal. Keşke benim de kafam dişlilerle dolu olsaydı da tıpkı Glaito gibi beni de açıp tamir edebilseydin."

languages.original_text: "Thank you, Pasqal. I wish my head were full of cogs so you could always open it and make repairs the same way you do for Glaito."
